医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
用显微镜和运动学重建技术可视化中心粒的发生细胞含有各种特殊的结构，例如细胞核、线粒体或过氧化物酶体，被称为“细胞器”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Visualizing-centriole-genesis-with-microscopy-and-kinematic-reconstruction-techniques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Visualizing-centriole-genesis-with-microscopy-and-kinematic-reconstruction-techniques.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c033340c-92eb-41de-a3f8-7a43c171b8c6 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 03:09:58 -0400 Visualizing centriole genesis with microscopy and kinematic reconstruction techniques
研究为仅使用 DCB 治疗左主干冠状动脉疾病的策略提供了宝贵的见解芬兰北卡累利阿中心医院心脏中心的 Sanna Uskela 等人进行了一项回顾性单中心注册研究，重点关注使用仅药物涂层球囊 (DCB) 策略治疗新发左主干冠状动脉疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-DCB-only-strategy-for-left-main-coronary-artery-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-DCB-only-strategy-for-left-main-coronary-artery-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eeaf83e2-17e1-4df4-9238-c0286cff78d9 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 03:02:00 -0400 Study provides valuable insights into the DCB-only strategy for left main coronary artery disease
大麻化合物 d-柠檬烯可减少 THC 引起的焦虑作用约翰霍普金斯大学医学院领导的研究小组补充了证据，证明大麻（也称为大麻）中天然存在的化学物质可以：适量-；减轻四氢大麻酚 (THC) 引起的焦虑作用，THC 是大麻中发现的主要精神活性姐妹化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Cannabis-compound-d-limonene-reduces-anxiety-inducing-effects-of-THC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Cannabis-compound-d-limonene-reduces-anxiety-inducing-effects-of-THC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b5b98c0-4872-4019-9475-13230d0b2078 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 02:47:44 -0400 Cannabis compound d-limonene reduces anxiety-inducing effects of THC
香叶醇可缓解 D-半乳糖诱导的衰老小鼠认知能力下降一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 6 期，题为“香叶醇减弱氧化应激和神经炎症介导的作用” D半乳糖诱导的小鼠衰老模型中的认知障碍。" https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Geraniol-alleviates-cognitive-decline-in-D-galactose-induced-aging-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Geraniol-alleviates-cognitive-decline-in-D-galactose-induced-aging-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=277c0e57-5e39-457c-afec-56ea3e3cfebf Fri, 12 Apr 2024 02:32:15 -0400 Geraniol alleviates cognitive decline in D-galactose-induced aging mice
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：亚利桑那州在堕胎方面倒退了亚利桑那州最高法院本周震动了全国堕胎辩论，裁定可以执行最初于 1864 年（在内战结束之前、亚利桑那州成为一个州之前几十年）通过的一项禁令。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Arizona-turns-back-the-clock-on-abortion-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Arizona-turns-back-the-clock-on-abortion-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=766494bf-3064-42af-87a2-d105c5014924 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 01:51:39 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Arizona turns back the clock on abortion access
产后注射小剂量艾氯胺酮可减少产后抑郁症英国医学杂志今天发表的一项临床试验发现，分娩后立即注射单次低剂量艾氯胺酮可减少怀孕期间有抑郁症状（产前抑郁症）的个体的重度抑郁发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Low-dose-esketamine-injection-after-childbirth-reduces-postpartum-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Low-dose-esketamine-injection-after-childbirth-reduces-postpartum-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d15fe233-fc7f-487a-acf5-8ab5c6a09e1e Fri, 12 Apr 2024 01:44:32 -0400 Low dose esketamine injection after childbirth reduces postpartum depression
研究揭示雄激素如何在细胞和分子水平上塑造性别差异性别差异在人类发育、生理过程和疾病中普遍存在，因此表征性别差异对这些领域的影响非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-sheds-light-on-how-androgens-shape-sex-differences-at-the-cellular-and-molecular-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-sheds-light-on-how-androgens-shape-sex-differences-at-the-cellular-and-molecular-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3776220-7877-467b-9f82-f34dbbf6fa9a Fri, 12 Apr 2024 01:21:50 -0400 Study sheds light on how androgens shape sex differences at the cellular and molecular levels
彻底改变心力衰竭治疗：机械循环支持装置的进步使子弹头列车能够以高达 200 英里/小时的速度行驶而不接触铁轨的技术，现在可以让衰竭的心脏继续跳动，并且在不久的将来，它将通过无线电源连接来实现这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Revolutionizing-heart-failure-treatment-Advances-in-mechanical-circulatory-support-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Revolutionizing-heart-failure-treatment-Advances-in-mechanical-circulatory-support-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9a088aa-53a1-46b6-8b57-be33bc7333ab Fri, 12 Apr 2024 01:17:04 -0400 Revolutionizing heart failure treatment: Advances in mechanical circulatory support devices
新综述探讨了睡眠、昼夜节律和新陈代谢方面的关键性别差异一项对研究证据的新回顾探讨了女性和男性睡眠方式、生物钟变化以及这如何影响新陈代谢的主要差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/New-review-explores-the-key-gender-differences-in-sleep-circadian-rhythms-and-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/New-review-explores-the-key-gender-differences-in-sleep-circadian-rhythms-and-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e040589-e85f-4416-a4bf-73bb6ed6d203 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 01:12:43 -0400 New review explores the key gender differences in sleep, circadian rhythms and metabolism
研究证实重量训练对老年人的心理健康有益重量训练可以帮助老年人减少体内脂肪并增加肌肉力量和质量，有助于功能自主并避免跌倒和受伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-confirms-the-mental-health-benefits-of-weight-training-for-older-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Study-confirms-the-mental-health-benefits-of-weight-training-for-older-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f578471-2c79-46c7-a607-189a​​399aa7c0 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 01:07:10 -0400 Study confirms the mental health benefits of weight training for older individuals
